11.content:
You remember that night with a feeling of dread.

The most item members of "Fortress" had gathered inell on their rival faction "The Dominion", as to a secret meeting that would host all of their top leadership. This was Fortress's chance to cripple that evil organization once and for all, and to finally thwart their attempts to institute a totalitarian tickling regime!

Years ago you had read throguh The Dominion's manifesto and the very act of reading it gave you an anxiety attack. A mandate that every citizen report for a tickling "audit" where their worst spots and techniques would be discovered and recorded for use against them in the future. Sadistic and cruel tickling and teasing punishments for even minor offenses, even a capital penalty for crimes against the state where the victim would be rendered totally paralyzed, unable to move or speak, and subjected to non stop tickling on every imaginable sensitive area of their body for years or decades!

After reading that manifesto, you immediately joined "Fortress" the last line of defense against those sadistic monsters. An organization that would use their tickling tactics against them!

And so the moment came, "operation jackhammer", the intel indicated that the top brass of The Dominion would be meeting secretly at the waterfront with minimal security. An entire legion of Fortress agents and leadership was sent there.

It was a trap.

Instead of crippling The Dominion, The Dominion was able to lure the entire leadership structure of Fortess to a secluded location and overwhelm them with traps, devices, tickling soldiers and all other manner of assault. It was dumb luck that you arrived late, only to find your generals, trainers and comrades restrained and pleading for mercy from their Dominion captors whole they jeered and taunted them.

You spotted your mentor, Jack, a tough, hunky guy who had showed you the basics of ticlkkng combat tactics. You saw him completely naked, on his back with his arms tied over his head and his legs elevated, ankles secured in a pair of stocks leaving his big bare feet pointing toward the sky for all the world to see.

Above them, two female Dominion agents grinned and skittered their fingers all over both of them. You also noticed a Dominion agent sitting above his head and "massaging" up and down his sides, ribs and armpits. And then, blushing, you noticed that, to add insult to injury, a device was making a stiff feather brush up and down his... "manhood" which was sporting an embarrassing "issue".

This big tough guy was reduced to tears, and in voice breaking with laughter, he blundered out "Please! I can't stand anymore I'll do anything!"

You'd never heard him beg like that before, he was the most stalwart person yiud ever known, these sadistic bitches had completely broken him!

One of the ladies plopped her feet on his chest and pointed them toward his face while another whispered in his ear.

He registered a look of shock. Squeezed his eyes shut and shook his head NO!

The whisperer took out two feathers and started lightly teasing his nipples.

He vigorously shook his head YES!

You saw him lean in and start planting little kisses up and down the pair of feet in front of him, starting with her feet and working his way up.

You saw a line forming behind the woman whose feet were being kissed and realized that your big tough trainer was in for a night of tickle torture and having to "service" his tormentors for even the slightest chance of getting any mercy.

Hearing the screams of laughter and pleas for mercy of your fellow Fortress members, you suddenly felt a terrible fear of being captured your self!

You ran as fast as you could away from the scene, back to a secret hiding place that Fortress had chosen in this kind of eventuality.

And now, The Dominion rules with an iron... feather, your comrades are all captured and subject to daily torment, and you, the last free member of fortress have got to do something to rescue them!

You have a long journey ahead of you, you'll have to defeat the entire Dominion hierarchy from the bottom up in order to rescue your friends.

You'll face:

The Brute

The Huntress

The Mad Doctor

The Warrior

The Psychic

And finally, the elusive "Mistress".

Hiw do you approach your first target "The Brute?"
11.title: Female

choices: Put on mandated attire and behave like a good citizen
Ignore the mandate, you're too shy!
Ignore the mandate, stick it to the man!
112.content:
You decide to gather as much intel on The Brute as you can before facing him. The Dominion controls the internet tightly so you'll have to go to the local indoctrination center and hack into the Dominion mainframe. It's risky but you'll have a definite advantage if you pull it off.

You experience a wave of anxiety as you change into the state mandated dress code.

For men they're forced to go shirtless and wear shorts with bare feet in flip flops for easy access to all the most sensitive areas of their bodies.

For women they're given the same except for a thin tank top that reveals their midriffs and their pits. A bra is allowed for modestly but must be designed to unclasp easily.

Wearing non-regulation attire is a capital offence punishable by a minimum of 24 hours in tickle square, (the public stocks) amd a maximum of up to 30 days in the chamber of torment. You don't know what that is and you don't want to find out!

How do you proceed out of the house?
112.title: Gather intel

1121.content:
You proceed to the center without incident. The large glass double doors chime and you hear a pleasant female voice as you enter:

Welcome to the Dominion indoctrination and re-education center. We're so glad you could join us and learn about our wonderful, beautiful, wise, kind, generous, benevolent mistress and her supreme corrrectitude. An attendant will be with you shortly to direct you to a learning station

An attendant approaches, a man wearing a long sleeved shirt, trousers, boots and a jacket. A Dominion officer, exempt from having to dress for maximum vulnerability.

He eyes you suspiciously as all dominion officers do the citizens.

"This way commoner" he says in a sneer.

He guides you to a computer terminal.

* If your talent is Combat go directly to Option 3.

If your talent is intellect Roll 1D6-1 and select the option rolled

If your talent is stealth, go directly to option 1
1121.title: Put on mandated attire and behave like a good c...

11211.content:
You instantly recognize the layout and configuration of this station. You sit in the chair and the cuffs on your arm rests snap onto your wrists. The ones on your footrest follow suit and snap onto your ankles as the foot rest elevates, pops off your flip flops and your bare feet are placed in a hole in your desk. Your arm wrests force your arms up over your head, stretching out your armpits and upper torso as your thin tank top is pulled up above your ribs and your bra is removed.

You try to hold back a grin as you expertly manipulate the control panel on your right arm rest and re calibrate the tickle tools to hover inches away from any of your bare spots. Close enough to look like they're tickling you but far enough to where they won't actually touch you.

The session begins and you see a plethora of tickle tools emerge from your seat and desk.

Two stiff feathers go for your neck, 2 for your armpits, massage wands go for your ribs, sides and abs while a stiff feather would be swirling in your navel, two stiff feathers go for your nipples, a massage want goes for your "womanhood", you sense feathers behind your knees and you're sure there are a multitude of little massage wands and feathers that would be tormenting every inch of your bare feet.

You swallow nervously. If you hadn't known how to reprogram this machine there's no way you'd be able to stand this absolutely insane torture.

The machine starts and you feign laughter to match the other citizens. With the Officers convinced that you're in ticklish agony, you easily hack into the mainframe and in no time you're searching around looking for intel on The Brute.

You found it.

He is a genetically engineered creature with 4 arms. He was meant to be the ultimate weapon in The Dominion't war of tickle domination, but he came with a major flaw.

Although 4 arms means that he can restrain an opponent's arms and legs and tickle them silly at the same time, it also means 4 armpits which is a major disadvantage if his arms ever got tied up.

The top dominion brass didn't trust him to be able to withstand a torture session if all 4 of his pits were laid into at once and so the man who was to be the undersecretary of the entire dominion army was relegated to a minor role, with very little inside information given to him for fear that he would crack under torture.

The Brute has resented his higher ups for years because of this.

You note down this information while giggling and writhing under the tickle torture on your sides, but you got what you came for, and after an agonizingly long torture session it finally ends.

You blend in with the rest of the citizens as you make your way out of the building and onto your target, The Brute!

(Add +2 to all rolls vs The Brute)
11211.title: 5-6 Great Success

11212.content:
You know that this is an indoctrination station and that you're going to be tickled. You mentally prepare your self for the ordeal, you'll have to tough it out in order to try and hack the console and gather your intel.

You sit down and allow the cuffs on the arm rests to snap around your wrists. The arms position them selves so that your hands are behind your head exposing your pits and pulling up your thin tank top above your ribs as your bra is torn away. The foot rests snap cuffs on your ankles and your flip flops are removed exposing your bare feet. The rest lifts up and places your feet in a hole in the desk.

You take deep breaths and remember your training.

You smile like a pod person like all the other citizens around you about to be indoctrinated throguh torture.

The administrator hits a switch and you're tickled on your...

Roll 1D6
11212.title: 3-4 Ordinary Success

112121.content:
Two massaging wands emerge and start aggressively running up and down your sides. You hear the laughs and giggles of the others around you.

You giggle and try to hold out as you manipulate the console trying to hack into the mainframe. You have no experience with hacking but you're hoping for lucky break!

Can you hold out?

Roll 1D6 - 1 add an additional minus for your sides score.
112121.title: 5-6 Sides

1121211.content:
The tickling on your sides is a little rough but you're able to tough it out!


You easily hack into the mainframe and in no time you're searching around looking for intel on The Brute.

You found it.

He is a genetically engineered creature with 4 arms. He was meant to be the ultimate weapon in The Dominion't war of tickle domination, but he came with a major flaw.

Although 4 arms means that he can restrain an opponent's arms and legs and tickle them silly at the same time, it also means 4 armpits which is a major disadvantage if his arms ever got tied up.

The top dominion brass didn't trust him to be able to withstand a torture session if all 4 of his pits were laid into at once and so the man who was to be the undersecretary of the entire dominion army was relegated to a minor role, with very little inside information given to him for fear that he would crack under torture.

The Brute has resented his higher ups for years because of this.

You note down this information while giggling and writhing under the tickle torture on your sides, but you got what you came for, and after an agonizingly long torture session it finally ends.

You blend in with the rest of the citizens as you make your way out of the building and onto your target, The Brute!

(Add +2 to all rolls vs The Brute)
1121211.title: 5-6 Great Success

11212111.content:
You easily hack into the mainframe and in no time you're searching around looking for intel on The Brute.

You found it.

He is a genetically engineered creature with 4 arms. He was meant to be the ultimate weapon in The Dominion't war of tickle domination, but he came with a major flaw.

Although 4 arms means that he can restrain an opponent's arms and legs and tickle them silly at the same time, it also means 4 armpits which is a major disadvantage if his arms ever got tied up.

The Brute has resented his higher ups for years because of this.

You note down this information while giggling and writhing under the tickle torture on your sides, but you got what you came for, and after an agonizingly long torture session it finally ends.

You blend in with the rest of the citizens as you make your way out of the building and onto your target, The Brute!

(Add +2 to all rolls vs The Brute)
11212111.title: 5-6 Great Success

11212112.content:
You sit there with your arms up getting your sides thoroughly worked over. You're in hysterics after the first 5 minutes and it takes all of your energy and concentration to withstand the torture. On a few occasions you manage to calm your self down enough to fiddle with the control panel on your right arm rest and, somehow you manage to navigate your station to the Dominion mainframe and read a basic bio on The Brute

He was genetically engineered to be the ultimate tickle warrior, a creature with 4 arms! However, his status was reduced quickly after he was instated and he was relegated to the bottom rung of the Dominion ladder. His major weakness is his armpits. Having 4 of them is a major disadvantage.

You make a mental note of this as your torture continues. You come very close to crying for mercy a few times but you manage to hold it together until the ordeal ends.

You walk out of the building feeling like you've been hit by a truck, but you got some Intel.

On to The Brute!

Add +1 to all roles when fighting The Brute.
11212112.title: 3-4 Ordinary Success

choices: Hours pass and you're taken to your trial
11212113.content:
The tickling on your sides is unbearable! You try to focus on hacking into the mainframe but the torture is overwhelming you. The other citizens are giggling and chuckling but your laughs are getting louder and louder and more uncontrolled. You start to pull against your arm restraints to lower your arms but they don't budge. Your laughter is so out of control that guards and citizens alike are staring at you skeptically!

You throw your head back and scream: "I CAN'T STAND ANYMORE PLEASE TURN IT OFF!!!!!! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA"

You laugh helplessly as the massage wands torment your sides relentlessly.

Two Dominion agents walk over and sternly announce "She's a spy from another faction she has to be!"

One of them leans, gets right in your face and demands: "Every citizen has been sensitized to a level 12 indoctrination, you've never had one have you? You're a soy aren't you?"

All the tickling has made you nice and submissive. You yell out:

"YES! YES! YES! I'M A SPY PLEASE HAVE MERCYAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

The officer gives you a look of disgust and gets on his radio.

"We have a spy here in indoctrination center 4. She's already in a machine... yes.... on her sides... yes, she's really suffering.... yes... okay, we'll leave her in until you get here... 2 hours? okay we'll see you then.

You IMMEDIATELY beg for mercy, your voice quivers and breaks with laughter as you blubber out:

"NO PLEASE I CANT TAKE TWO HOURS OF TICKLING! PLEASE HAVE MERCY! PLEASE HAVE MERCY! PLEASE I SUBMIT TO THE DOMINION! I'M A LOUSY SPY I SUBMIT ILL DO ANYTHING NOT TWO HOURS PLEASE!!!!!!!"

You continue to laugh and beg pitifully as the Officer abandons you. The center is evacuated and you catch something about officials on the way to take you to your trial.

Your sides and belly are sore from laughter and your eyes are pouring down tears as the last patron leaves and turns out the lights leaving you to suffer in the dark.

You beg for mercy even though there's nobody to plead with.
11212113.title: 1-2 Failure

1121212.content:
The tickling on your sides is really getting to you. You manage to concentrate enough to fumble around the control panel, but it takes so much energy and concentration to keep from losing it that you just can't focus. You come VERY close to breaking and crying out for mercy but your training takes over and you're eventually able to calm your self down enough to do a rudimentary hack of the mainframe.

You manage to bring up a basic bio of The Brute. He was genetically engineered to be the ultimate tickle weapon, a creature with 4 arms. But for some reason he was relegated to the lower tiers of the Dominion hierarchy. His major weak spots are his armpits, having 4 of them is a major disadvantage.

That's about all you're able to get before the unbearable tickling up and down your sides gets to you again and you spend the next 20 minutes toughing it out, giggling laughing and trying not to beg for mercy and blow your cover.

When its over you leave with the rest of the citizens but, unlike them, you look like you've been hit by a truck. You're grateful for the information you got and you head out to seek your target.

(Add +1 to all roles against The Brute!)
1121212.title: 3-4 Ordinary Success

choices: Hours pass and you're taken to your trial

You beg for mercy even though there's nobody to plead with.
1121213.title: 1-2 Failure

112122.content:
Two stiff feathers emerge from the console and start brushing all over your bare armpits.

Your giggles join those of the citizens around you.

You have to tough it out long enough to hack the computer.

Can you tough it out?

Roll 1D6 add minuses based on your spot score.
112122.title: 3-4 Pits

1121221.content:
The tickling on your armpits is a little rough but you're able to tough it out!

But for some reason he was relegated to the lower tiers of the Dominion hierarchy. His major weak spots are his armpits, having 4 of them is a major disadvantage. given your situation, with feathers exploring and tormenting every inch of your pits, you can only imagine what 4 would feel like! You begin to actually feel sorry for him.

The officer gives you a look of disgust and gets on his radio.

"We have a spy here in indoctrination center 4. She's already in a machine... yes.... on her armpits... yes, she's really suffering.... yes... okay, we'll leave her in until you get here... 2 hours? okay we'll see you then.

You continue to laugh and beg pitifully as the Officer abandons you. The center is evacuated and you catch something about officials on the way to take you to your trial.

1121233.title: 1-2 Failure

11213.content:
You sit in the chair with no thought whatsoever for the fact that this is a behavior and thought modification station.

You failed to notice the cuffs attached to the arms of the chair as they snap onto your wrists. the arm rests elevate making you clasp your hands behind your head revealing your armpits and pulling your already short tank top above your ribs as your bra is quickly snapped off.

You panic and struggle, your eyes dart around looking for someone to help you as you blurt out "N... no... please I can't stand... please I... I don't want..."

Everyone is looking at you in shock, especially the Dominion officers! The other citizens came here for this, they're eager for this, and you realize to your horror that you just gave away the fact that you're a rebel.

The foot rests slip off your flip flops and another pair of cuffs bind your ankles as your bate feet are elevated and placed in a hole in the desk.

You squeal and are about to start crying, this is your worst nightmare.

An officer walks over

"Who are you?" He asks.

You try to think of a good lie but your thinking is interrupted by the sensation of little massage wands running aggressively all over your bare feet!

I... AAAAAAAAAAAH! PLEASE STAHAHAHAHHAHAAP

Your screams of laughter join the other citizens whose feet are all recieving the same treatment. You dont know what to do, this is already way more than you can stand.

You start babbling incoherently begging for mercy as you feel the little wands skittering over all the most sensitive parts of your feet.

The officer says "admit that you're a rebel spy!"

Without hesitating you throw your head back and scream: "YES! YES! YES!"

The sadistic guy grins and leans in closer "You're a ticklish spy who can't stand being tickled on her feet"

His comments push you even more over the edge and in a voice breaking with laughter, you scream out "YES! YES! YES! IM A TICKLISH SPY AND I CANT STAND BEING TICKLED ON MY FEET!"

His grin widens and he leans in so that hes whispering in your ear.

"You must have had a good hiding place, probably have friends who escaped the purge. I'd love to know the location of all thise secret hiding places."

You tell him. Completely breaking under torture. Your spirit is crushed with guilt thinking of your comrades being black bagged and sent to suffer the worst tickle torture imaginable because of you, but you've been rendered totally submissive and cooperative.

He condescendingly pats you on the head as you continue to scream with laughter. He addresses the program director

"She's a spy, she needs complete indoctrination"

The director presses a button and the console produces a plethora of vibrating wands and stiff feathers.

Two feathers start swishing around your neck, two go to your armpits, two vibrating wands start buzzing on your nipples, two go to your sides, to on your ribs. A feather cycles around your navel while a wand traces around your abs and lower belly, a want buzzes on your "womanhood", two on your thighs and lower calves as the tiny little vibrators continue to punish your feet!

You are in the worst tickle agony of your life, the sexual teasing is brutal increases your sensitivity. You go completely catatonic and can only let out a soft "my god... my god... I submit... please..."

The officer grins and abandons you as the screen switches on. A beautiful woman smiles at you and says, in maddening ASMR "Now, let's start at the beginning... The Mistress deserves my mind, my body and my spirit".

You open your mouth and quiver out the words. You know that very soon, you'll believe them...


GAME OVER
11213.title: 1-2 Failure

info.brief_description: A solo RPG with light table top mechanics.
info.description:
The following are optional rules for RPG elements that might make the game more fun. If it isn't your kind of thing, feel free to ignore it altogether.

For these rules, have a D6 handy, or you can download any number of dice rolling apps.

You will select choices based on your rolls. IE: The options for every chapter will be numbered 1-2, 3-4, and 5-6. The higher the better, and your talents and ticklish spots will modify those rolls, giving + or - 1 depending on what you chose.



Pick your talent:

Combat

Stealth

Intellect

Where are you REALLY ticklish?

Rate each spot
0 (Not very or not at all)
-1 (really ticklish there!)
-2 (EXTREMELY ticklish there!)

Feet
Thighs
Knees (front and/or behind)
"Private" area
Sides
Stomach
Ribs
Chest/nipples
Armpits
Neck

Your opponants will have weak spots as well.
